meanings.definition: The quality or state of being golden in color or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The goldennesses of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry sparkled with the goldennesses of the precious metal.
meanings.sent3: The goldennesses of the paint made the room look like a royal palace.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a goldennesses that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The goldennesses of the autumn leaves created a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being valuable or highly prized.
meanings.sent1: The goldennesses of her friendship was more precious than any treasure.
meanings.sent2: In his collection, the goldennesses of the rare coin stood out.
meanings.sent3: She treasured the goldennesses of her grandmother's old necklace.
meanings.sent4: His words held a goldennesses that touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The goldennesses of honesty is a rare gem in today's world.

meanings.definition: The essence or nature of something being golden.
meanings.sent1: The goldennesses of the sun's rays warmed the earth.
meanings.sent2: The goldennesses of her voice filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The goldennesses of the cake made it irresistible to all.
meanings.sent4: His kindness had a goldennesses that shone through in every action.
meanings.sent5: The goldennesses of the moment was captured in the photograph.
